title: Insatiable
brief_description: A stylised, abstract musical narrative working around ideas of “performance”. Four singers who arrive at an old theatre for an audition. As they wait their turn to be called to perform, the singers gradually reveal through songs more about their pasts and speculate on their possible futures.
